TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICredentials

Docs.summary: Provides the base authentication interface for retrieving credentials for Web client authentication.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ICredentials interface provides the <xref:System.Net.ICredentials.GetCredential%2A> method to objects that supply network credentials to applications.
## Examples The following example illustrates how to use the ICredentials interface.
[!code-cs[ICredential#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.net.icredentials_1.cs)] [!code-vb[ICredential#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.net.icredentials_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[ICredential#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.net.icredentials_1.cpp)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Net.NetworkCredential GetCredential (Uri uri, string authType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Net.NetworkCredential GetCredential(class System.Uri uri, string authType) cil managed

Docs.param: The that the client is providing authentication for.
The type of authentication, as defined in the property.
Docs.summary: Returns a object that is associated with the specified URI, and authentication type.
Docs.returns: The that is associated with the specified URI and authentication type, or, if no credentials are available, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The GetCredential method returns a <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> instance that contains the credentials that are associated with the specified URI and authorization scheme. When no credentials are available, the GetCredential method returns `null`.
## Examples The following uses GetCredential to retrieve a <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> instance.
[!code-cs[ICredential#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.net.icredential_1.cs)] [!code-vb[ICredential#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.net.icredential_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[ICredential#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.net.icredential_1.cpp)]
